Joe Biden condemns violence of US race protests --statement tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740533 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740533/joe-biden-condemns-violence-of-us-race-protests-statement/story/ US presidential candidate Joe Biden on Sunday condemned the violence of race protests that have erupted across the United States but said Americans had a right to demonstrate. BOC seizes P1 billion worth of counterfeit cigarettes, tax stamps tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740532 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/740532/boc-seizes-p1-billion-worth-of-counterfeit-cigarettes-tax-stamps/story/ The Bureau of Customs Quick Reaction Team and the Isabela Philippine National Police on Saturday confiscated P1 billion worth of counterfeit cigarettes and tax stamps from a warehouse in Victoria Alicia, Isabela. Allowing 'back-riding' in GCQ areas difficult to implement -DOTr exec tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740526 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740526/allowing-back-riding-in-gcq-areas-difficult-to-implement-dotr-exec/story/ Allowing "back-riding" on motorcycles in areas under general community quarantine may be difficult to implement considering the huge volume of riders and passengers that need to be checked one by one, an official at the Department of Transportation (DOTr) said Sunday. US protests over death of George Floyd in Minneapolis rage on amid political finger-pointing tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740520 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740520/us-protests-over-death-of-george-floyd-in-minneapolis-rage-on-amid-political-finger-pointing/story/ The full Minnesota National Guard was activated for the first time since World War Two after four nights of civil unrest that has spread to other US cities following the death of a black man shown on video gasping for breath as a white Minneapolis policeman knelt on his neck. Sun, 31 May 2020 11:27:22 +0800
PNP ready for Metro Manila's shift to GCQ on June 1 --Eleazar tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740516 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/740516/pnp-ready-for-metro-manila-s-shift-to-gcq-on-june-1-eleazar/story/ The Philippine National Police is ready for Metro Manila's shift from modified enhanced community quarantine to general community quarantine on Monday, Joint Task Force COVID Shield Commander Police Lieutenant General Guillermo Eleazar said on Sunday. Jeepneys, UV Express may be allowed in Metro Manila before June 21 if needed --DOTr exec tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740515 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/740515/jeepneys-uv-express-may-be-allowed-in-metro-manila-before-june-21-if-needed-dotr-exec/story/ Jeepneys and UV Express units may be allowed to operate in Metro Manila even before the Phase 1 of the resumption of public transportation ends on June 21 to augment the number of public utility vehicles serving commuters, Transport Assistant Secretary Mark De Leon said on Sunday. Brazil's coronavirus outbreak worsens as total cases near 500,000 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740511 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740511/brazil-s-coronavirus-outbreak-worsens-as-total-cases-near-500-000/story/ Brazil registered a record 33,274 new cases of the novel coronavirus on Saturday, its health ministry said, raising the total to 498,440 in a country with one of the world's worst outbreaks. Sun, 31 May 2020 07:18:50 +0800
